title: Schindler calls takeover report "unsubstantiated, factually wrong" - Nasdaq.com
text: ZURICH, Sept 5 (Reuters) - Swiss elevator and escalator maker Schindler  said on Thursday that a report in an Italian newspaper about takeover discussions involving rival United Technologies Corp  unit Otis Elevator was "unsubstantiated and factually wrong".

"In general, we don't comment on market rumours," a spokeswoman said in a statement. "In this particular case, however, we are compelled to state that these rumours are completely unsubstantiated and factually wrong."
Schindler shares were off session highs but still up 2.3% by 0902 GMT.
